Screenshot Clothing offers surprisingly fresh, casual, and comfortable styles with excellent sizing. As a petite guy (waist 28-29, H: 5’5”), I find their small size truly fits like a small—unlike the inflated sizing often seen in American brands today.  In a market where XS has virtually disappeared, and ‘small’ now resembles a medium, Screenshot stands out by providing accurate, well-proportioned sizes that fit comfortably without the baggy, oversized feel of today’s typical Small. Beyond their unique, funky style, this brand ensures clothing feels right and fits perfectly. A HUGE fan, I only desire that I could afford more of them.

A couple of years ago I was searching for a last minute Christmas present for my son and ended up buying a screenshot brand sweatshirt (without a hood). I really didn’t expect much - it looked cute online but I’m used to disappointment. When I received the item, I was so surprised to find that not only was it better looking than I expected it to be, it was really thick and soft and I ended up buying a hoodie for myself.  I don’t like wearing clothing that attracts attention. I’ve had the hoodie for over a year and every time I wear it I have strangers approach (or holler at) me to tell me that it looks good. It’s so well-made that I wear it anyways even though I feel self conscious. This year, I wanted to replace a couple of old sweatshirts of mine but I didn’t want to buy something from this brand because there’s very little they produce that doesn’t have a graphic I’m uncomfortable with or a color on that demands people look at me - ie, I don’t want to wear a teddy bear with it’s head ripped off or an ice cream cone with a long, pointy dripping tongue and I’m white so the word “privileged” is something I should not wear for obvious reasons. But I finally realized that there just isn’t any other sweatshirt or hoodie out there that I know for sure is as thick and warm as this brand carries. The price for the quality is just unbeatable. I’m not exaggerating. So I settled on a couple of things that I like enough to deal with the attention I’m going to end up receiving. I’d love it if the company would make a few things that were a little more low key *hint* *hint*  I have big hips and I found the sweatshirt and hoodie to have a slimmer fit and I needed to size up from my usual size. If you want this to fit loosely just to lounge around in, one to two sizes up is a must.
